TopicTitle: Mac instability issues - Retina Displays poll

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to narrow down causes for the OS X instability issues, so I'm creating some polls to test hypotheses as experimentally as is possible on the forums.

This poll is about Retina displays, but has options for those who do not have one. If you have a Retina display and experience instability, I'd appreciate if you tried the Low Resolution Option:

  1. Go to your KSP folder
  2. Right-click/ctrl-click on the KSP app
  3. Get Info
  4. Check the box for "Open in Low Resolution"
